text: Roxborough is a town in Trinidad and Tobago, Located at the southern shore of the Island of Tobago, it has a population of 2,089 (2011). ==History== The settlement was named after the cocoa plantation Roxborough Estate. == See also == *List of cities and towns in Trinidad and Tobago ==References== Category:Populated places in Trinidad and Tobago Category:Trinidad (island)
title: Roxborough, Trinidad and Tobago
